title: Slide Stoppers Non-Skid Pads For Men's & Women's Shoes
features: Two 2”x5” thin runner strips with 75 small rubber spikes apiece
Spikes grip firmly to any surface
description: The product significantly helps to prevent slip and falls. Unlike anything on the market the 75 soft rubber spikes on each strip grip any type of surface firmly, are permanent, and adhere securely to any type of foot ware. They also provide a shock absorbent feel and prolong the life of foot ware soles.
